Paysley: Paysley Settings
Paysley redirects customers to Paysley to enter their payment information.

Paysley: Title
This is the title which the user sees during checkout.

Paysley: Description
This is the description which the user sees during checkout.
"Paysley": "Dit is de beschrijving die de gebruiker tijdens het afrekenen ziet."

Paysley: Access Key
This is the access key, received from Paysley developer portal. ( required )

Paysley: On administration panel go to menu : Sales > Orders
"Paysley": "Ga in het beheerpaneel naar menu: Verkoop > Orders"

Paysley: Select the transaction that you want to refund
"Paysley": "Selecteer de transactie die u wilt terugbetalen"

Paysley: Click invoice menu on the left side
Click the invoice data on the right side
"Paysley": "Klik op de factuurgegevens aan de rechterkant"

Paysley: Click on Credit memo
Then click the refund button
